subject: Maintenance of Stretches entrusted to NHAI - Corrigendum to NHAI/ Policy Guidelines No. 18.37/2019 dated 09.12.2019
text: IRay <t4  rTHNf gifera<ur Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (eq 4RarT 3 {oTAf TATTT4) Tax / Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) ii-5 & 6, #qer-10 , EVFT, # @erlt-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhl-110075 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ SOP for Contract Management/ 2020 Policy Circular No. 18.39/2020 Dated 12'March, 2020 [Decision taken on File No. 11041/280/2018/Coord] Sub. Maintenance of stretches entrusted to NHAI Corrigendum to NHAI/ Policy Guidelines No. 18.37/2019 dated 09.12.2019 Circular No. Tech (209/2016) dated 02.08.2016 mentioned at Para-A & B.1 (ii) of Policy Guidelines No. 18.37/2019 dated 09.12.2019 is replaced with Policy Guidelines No. 18.24/2017 dated 21.08.2017 (Para-10.5). Accordingly, it is clarified that the powers vest with RO for sanctioning the maintenance estimate (O&M; Renewal, SR etc.) upto Rs. 10 cr. per project per annum. W i93 (V.K. Sharma) CGM (Coord) to: (i) All officers and employees of HQJROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Officers (ii) Hindi Officer for trunslation in Hindi (iii) Library for hosting the circular on library site 7414 M RI Ri 4i NHAI Copy
